page.title: 05Recreation around Brafferton
page.content: One new form of recreation has developed at Ketton Hall about three miles from Brafferton.The Hall which was originally a monastry has about three hundred acres of farmland but has recently established a kennels and a{riding}school.The school has 19 ponies which are used for tuition for novice riders and a menage for jumping practice.The many tracks and fields in the area are used for hacking.The riding school has staged a number of gymkhanas in recent years.Altogether Ketton Hall provides several employment opportunities for the area.
